Message -----

ednesday, May 30, 2001 11:06 AM

think this link( http://junit.sourceforge.net/doc/cookbook/cookbook.htm) do=
es not work any more. Does any body know the mirror site or they moved this=
 page to where.

  Thanks.

  Andrew
    -----Original Message-----
    Fro=
m: Philippe Vanpeperstraete [mailto:philippe.vanpeperstraete@...]

 Sent: Wednesday, May 30, 2001 11:48 AM

ubject: RE: [junit] testing junit

on" tab, there, you'll find the JUnit cookbook, which is a pretty good star=
t, if you get your Java environment straight.

    regards
    Philippe
   =
   -----Original Message-----
      From: Ram Kumar [mailto:y_ramkumar@hotm=
ail.com]
      Sent: woensdag 30 mei 2001 16:33
      To: junit@yahoogroups=
.com

      I am a new=

ot find proper documentation about how to install JUnit and use it, in JUni=

out JUnit?

      Awaiting your immediate reply.

      Thanks,

      Yama=
sani.
